Detailed Description

Temporary string allocator for Simple API interface.

Author:
Cidana, Inc.
Version:
2.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CI_StringAlloc::CI_StringAlloc ( const CI_TCHAR *  szString1,
const CI_TCHAR *  szString2,
const CI_TCHAR *  szString3,
int  nAdditional 
) [inline]

Constructs temporary space to contain 3 concatenated strings + nAdditional chars.

One more byte is added for the null character.

Parameters:
szString1is pointer to string 1.
szString2is pointer to string 2.
szString3is pointer to string 3.
nAdditionalis number of additional characters.

Constructs temporary space to contain one string + nAdditional chars.

One more byte is added for the null character.
